hours_text:
###### VISIT OUR CAMPUS

Closed Monday

Tues - Sat: 10 am to 5 pm | Sun: 2 to 5 pm

​

[Admission ](http://114326.blackbaudhosting.com/114326/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=dacee63e-332f-4ba9-a2e8-8a087327fb77)

[Campus ](https://www.museumsw.org/visit)

[Directions ](https://www.museumsw.org/visit)

[Call ](https://www.museumsw.org/visit)

Visit Top

Comprised of four distinct facilities, the Museum of the Southwest's campus is the home to the Turner Memorial Art Museum which includes the Historic Turner Mansion and the Lissa Noël Wagner Wing, along with the Blakemore Planetarium and the Fredda Turner Durham Children's Museum. 

[Now On View ](https://www.museumsw.org/exhibitions)

Admissions

## ADMISSION

The cost of admission grants you entry to each of our facilities. On Sundays, admission is free courtesy of Coterra Energy Inc.

## members

##### [FREE](https://www.museumsw.org/membership)

## adults

##### [$12](http://114326.blackbaudhosting.com/114326/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=dacee63e-332f-4ba9-a2e8-8a087327fb77)

## children + seniors

##### [$8](http://114326.blackbaudhosting.com/114326/tickets?tab=3&txobjid=dacee63e-332f-4ba9-a2e8-8a087327fb77)

## 0-2 yrs

##### FREE

Facilities

## CAMPUS

Historic Turner Mansion

Step back in time.  

Lissa Noël Wagner Wing

Discover something new.  

Blakemore Planetarium

Go beyond the Tall City!  

Fredda Turner Durham Children's Museum

Come have fun!  

Directions

## DIRECTIONS

## Museum of the Southwest Campus

1705 W. Missouri Ave...
